about_the_game:
Demo description:

This demo include the main menu, the tutorial map and the first level of the game.
It will allow you to explore the universe of Action Fubuki and get an idea.

Sinopsis:

You are Fubuki GORO. You have been trained since your childhood in order to become a deadly kunoichi of the GORO clan.
You are employed by the government in the Special Action Agency SAA. They send you anywhere they need to elimainate a threat to the government.

Today, you have a new mission:
Eliminate Elon DUSK, the CEO of EXE company. He is leading some dangerous experimentation on humans, modifying the DNA in order to create super soldiers.
The government has asked multiple time to stop and close the facility but DUSK want to go further and further to the end of his objective.

Therefore, the government has no hope and order the SAA to eliminate DUSK and all the dangerous persons you will encounter in the facility.

The facility is positioned in a place unknown but we know that you will find it!

The gameplay:

It is all about action. You will use your keyboard and your mouse and mainly your mouse to manipulate Fubuki.
The action is very fast paced with a large diversity of enemies.

At the end of the game, you will meet Elon DUSK and we already know that he have been "upgraded"!

Use your famous Goro Taijutsu and your special techniques using your shakra but beware not to tired yourself too quickly as it could sign your death!
detailed_description:
Buzz


About the Demo

Demo description:

This demo include the main menu, the tutorial map and the first level of the game.
It will allow you to explore the universe of Action Fubuki and get an idea.

Sinopsis:

name: Action Fubuki Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Action Fubuki is a fast paced action game and focus above all on action with an interesting gameplay. Use your brain and your fingers to act quickly before you die.....again!
